attributes.action: pass a law allowing the castration of sex offenders and paedophiles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The jails are full. Sex offenders and paedophiles roam our streets. Punishment is, usually, minimal for the offences they commit. Lets stop them doing these vile things again - physically remove from them the ability. Oh, and never mind their "Human Rights". These people removed any rights they had under that legislation when they committed the offences they did.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
